/post/tags: GET - GET all the post on the basis of tags
/newpost/:userId: POST - Create new post - require Authentication and Authorization
/editpost/:postId: PUT - Edit the post - require Authentication and Authorization
/deletepost/:postId: DELETE - Delete the post - require Authentication and Authorization
/user/edituser/:userId: PUT - Edit the User - require Authentication and Authorization
/user/deluser/:userId: DELETE - Delete the User - require Authentication and Authorization
